name: DungeonEscape
setup: Three agents and a dragon inside a dungeon; one agent must defeat the dragon to drop a key, others must escape with the key before the dragon flees.
goal: Use teamwork to unlock the door and have at least one agent escape before time runs out.

agents.description: Three cooperating agents with a shared group reward; the dragon is scripted and not learning.

terms: +1.0 group reward when an agent unlocks the door and escapes.
Episodes end if the dragon escapes through its portal, with no escape reward.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: Ray-based perception of walls, door, key, dragon, portal, and other agents plus a flag for carrying a key.
behavior_parameters.actions: 1 discrete branch with 7 actions (rotate left/right, move in four directions, or stay still).
